msg: Add suppression of the "SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON" statement for Sybase/Microsoft SQL Server when no delimited identifiers shall be used

author: tomdz
msg: The platforms now use delimited identifiers for their operations (DDLUTILS-15) though this can be turned off via the platform info (support in the ant task follows)
Added test cases for the column constraints (required, default etc.) and the table constraints (indices etc.)
